name: Candy Charming Match3 Fun
description:
Candy Charming Match3 Fun is the right unique match 3 game for you. It’s the best around you can spend hours playing without getting bored! you must try it, Travel through unique fantastic match and enjoy hundreds of match-3 puzzle adventure!.
* Easy game to learn, yet challenging to master
* Exciting match 3 puzzle game play with hundreds of unique levels
* Different difficulty levels with different interesting patterns!
* Powerful combo Blaster
* Amazing graphics and unique characters
* Nice Effect with Relaxing Music
